data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Shizuoka to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shizuoka, Japan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Shizuoka.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 21,371 believers in the state of Shizuoka.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 3,692,864 lost people in  Shizuoka, Japan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Judeo-Japanese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Judeo-Japanese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Judeo-Japanese people is yours.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,774,500 souls in Shizuoka and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Shizuoka, Japan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
God, we pray for the believers in Shizuoka, Japan to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

location.name: Shizuoka
location.people_groups_list: Turk, Miyako, Ryukyuan, Okinawan, Ryukyuan, Eurasian, Kunigami
